t: Product Highlights
s: Lamson & Sessions manufactures and markets a wide variety of industry-leading products for the telecommunications, electrical, construction, consumer, power, and waste-water markets. For more details on these products, please visit the "Our Businesses" section of our web site.

t: The Lamson & Sessions Co. | Encyclopedia.com
s: After a series of debt restructurings, divestments, and strategic acquisitions, the reformed company was primarily involved in the production of thermoplastic products.
